action.name: Multiattack
entries: Elkhorn makes two Dagger or +1 Longsword attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature that is Large or bigger, it takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw}  {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage when used with two hands. If the target is a creature that is Large or bigger, it takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Feint {@recharge 5}
entries: Elkhorn targets one creature that he can see within 5 feet of him. Elkhorn has advantage on the next attack roll he makes against that target before the end of his turn. If that attack hits, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage of the weapon's type.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
